thread.section_title: Hotel Nicolo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short holiday in Paris
thread.title_full: Short holiday in Paris - Review of Hotel Nicolo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Paolo B
title: Short holiday in Paris
text:
The hotel is at 10-15 min of walking from Eiffel tower and 5 minutes from nearest metro station (Passy).
The hotel has a small elevator that can fit a couple of persons plus a trolley.
The room was small (Paris standard) with en suite bathroom. It was very clean, bed was comfortable and room was very very quiet.
The breakfast was good with large choice.
Staff was gentle.
Wifi free.
For a 2 star hotel in Paris, it is a very good choice.
